summary: Adds an essential rogue follower to The Bannered Mare in Whiterun, for your gaming Pleasure :]
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8080/8299587120_800b38894e_z.jpg[/img]
and please upload your screenshots! :]

I\'m releasing a less fat cheek  version soon, but keep in mind how we are all imperfect and thus create perfection on the nexus.


[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8355/8298536967_574e6335d8_z.jpg[/img]
                                                   [u]Her Origin[/u]

- Katherine\'s father, Thanus, fled from the ranks of Titus Mead II\'s army, after it being divided, and him being put under General Decianus in 4E 175, in the Colovian Highlands near Chorral durring The Great War.  He later Settled down near Falkreath, where he found his true love Sehren, a gorgeous Breton woman. Sehren bore two children, Chelsea (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28188/), and Katherine.
   
     Thanus\'s old buddy from the war, Andreif, the father of Alvhilde (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25249/), Hadn\'t heard from Katherine\'s family in a while...  Thats because in 4E 180, a 750,000-gold bounty was put on Thanus\'s head for being a deserter. As a consequence Katherine\'s house was raided by bandits looking to make some cash, ultimately leading to the demise of her parents. 

       The two young girls survived and were divided amongst the rabble in Skyrim. It is now 4E 201, and Katherine resides in Whiterun, at The Bannered Mare.



[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8498/8299587304_f74911a34f_z.jpg[/img]

  This Mod is Standalone, Nothing should be required.





[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8363/8298536883_085eaf6f59_z.jpg[/img]

     [u]WARNING This mod Contains Nudity[/u]
   If anybody feels objective, please PM me.
    I will then remove the part that shouldn\'t be here, or give you proper credits.



[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8077/8298537081_1fd0b30e1a_z.jpg[/img]

   

Dimon99 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/537675 For Body Model

Navetsea http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/496662 For Body Texture

LogRaam http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/308756 For Eye\'s

RAN64 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1713099 For Hair
author: Kurumu1337
